CONTACTS_PAGGING_COUNT_GET.SQL: select count(*) as count from contacts inner join fos_user on fos_user.id = contacts.friend_id where user_id =  ? #filters#;

CONTACTS_PAGGING_GET.SQL: select * from contacts inner join fos_user on fos_user.id = contacts.friend_id where user_id =  ? #filters# ORDER BY #sort_by# #sort_order# LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

CONTACTS_SEARCH_GET.SQL: select * from contacts inner join fos_user on fos_user.id = contacts.friend_id where user_id =  ? and username like ?
